about_description: The Local Weather allows you to track the current and future weather of cities of your choosing.
search_city: Search for your city by entering the name into the search bar.
select_city: Select a city within the results, this will take you to the current weather for your selection.
track_city: Track the city by clicking on the "+" icon in the top right. This will save the city to view at a later time on the home page.
remove_city_description: If you no longer wish to track a city, simply select the city within the home page. At the bottom of the page, there will be an option to delete the city.
search_placeholder: Search for a city or state
search_error: Sorry, something went wrong, please try again.
no_results: No results match your search, try a different city or state.
no_locations_added: No locations added. To start tracking a location, search in the field above.
preview_city_message: You are currently previewing this city, click the "+" icon to start tracking this city.
